text: Mushroom Records is an Australian record company started by Michael Gudinski and Ray Evans in Melbourne in 1972. After its sale in 1998, it joined with Festival Records (Australia) and became Festival Mushroom Records. In 2006 it became one of the record labels owned by Warner Bros. Records. It is currently internationally known as WEA International Inc. Category:Australian record labels Category:1972 establishments Category:1970s establishments in Australia Category:Electropop
title: Mushroom Records
